description:
Joint Decision and Verification Order required to confirm the naming of the newly developed building on site of 365 Fulham Road SW10 9TN, to be known as Ocean House, 365 Fulham Road SW10 9TN, and to confirm the description and numbering of the newly developed and separately accessed retail and residential units therein, linked to Planning applications PP/18/05392 and PP/21/04245, as follows:

Shop/Commercial (Ground and Basement), 365 Fulham Road SW10 9TN

Flat 1 (Ground and Basement) Ocean House, 365 Fulham Road Chelsea SW10 9TN
Flat 2 (Ground and Basement) Ocean House, 365 Fulham Road Chelsea SW10 9TN
Flat 3 (First Floor) Ocean House, 365 Fulham Road Chelsea SW10 9TN
Flat 4 (First Floor) Ocean House, 365 Fulham Road Chelsea SW10 9TN
Flat 5 (Second Floor) Ocean House, 365 Fulham Road Chelsea SW10 9TN
Flat 6 (Second Floor) Ocean House, 365 Fulham Road Chelsea SW10 9TN
Flat 7 (Third Floor) Ocean House, 365 Fulham Road Chelsea SW10 9TN
Flat 8 (Third Floor) Ocean House, 365 Fulham Road Chelsea SW10 9TN
